website_summaries.verdict: A hanging toiletry bag that's perfect for travel or use in small spaces like dorm rooms.
pros: Hangs up to free up counter space
Several zip and storage compartments for maximum organization
Can fit larger items, such as shampoo and body wash
cons: Some of the pockets are almost too small to be useful

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toiletry bag!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new toiletry bag for our upcoming vacation. When I first received the bag, I was a little disappointed in the size... it seems a little on the small side. But it held all of my products. I could have had more if I used travel size bottles. The sides for makeup and brushes is great. The hanger is nice to keep the bathroom counter clear and be able to see everything. But it can be in the way when you go to zip the bag up... not a big issue. I do wish the bags came in more colors/patterns too. Overall, great bag and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Great Organization & Doesn't Hog Carry-On Space
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned at first because it was smaller than I expected, but I found that the other reviewers were right - you can organize a lot of stuff in here, including full size products. There's even room to stuff those "just in case" things like safety pins and hair clips. When you close it all up the bag fits nicely in your carry-on (I've had bags before that barely left me room for clothing!). The ability to hang it up at your destination is also super convenient. I bought the purple - it's a pretty, rich color and the construction quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine bag, bogus return policy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. However it was too large for our luggage. So they charged us $5.99 to return it. Think about that for a second . . . . It cost us 30% of the price of the bag to send it back. Next time, shop at a regular store so you can see the item and get your money back.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product, Everything Fits!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, was able to fit everything needed to travel for a family of four. It's exactly what I had been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: SJB

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Toiletries Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite toiletry bags by far! It's large enough to fit everything I need to bring with me on short weekend trips or long vacations. I was able to fill it up with everything I need and still have room to spare. I would highly recommend this for yourself or as a gift for a family member or friend. It's affordable and it's a great product that will be used over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Tee

customer_reviews.title: From chaos to order!
customer_reviews.text: I went from a big mess to organization. My former bag (photo here) was so cluttered I found 3 sample size toothpastes because I could never find it when I needed it. This case will certainly change that. I chose to create categories of organization: nails, meds/first aid, and toiletries. I wasnt able to keep everything in its designated category due to size but it is SO much better than my old one. I do prefer a more "constructed" look but that is a matter of preference. It is very functional (packed photo here) so I can't complain. I am not done packing it but I am sure it will fit the remaining 3 items easily.
customer_reviews.author: MDM

customer_reviews.title: The zippers did not have the pull tabs ( see attached picture)
customer_reviews.text: the quality control on this product is non existent. The zippers did not have the pull tabs ( see attached picture)
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: Well padded, great organizer but large
customer_reviews.text: I travel 150 nights a year. This truly helps keep me organized. You can put your hair brush , cosmetics in the separate compartments band perfume in same bag. It is big though. Takes up a shoe box size in 21” carry on,I would take the measurements and make a template to see if it fits. but so well padded you don’t have to worry about breakage. Lastly I didn’t think I would use the hanger! But this week at a Florida Wyndham red ants used the bathroom as a path. The bag kept them out of my make up!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toiletry bag that makes sense.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a long time to find a bag that would fit all my toiletries but also be well functioning. This bag makes sense in the way it is a laid out. it has several pockets and zipped compartments. My only complaint is the elastic bands are too small their opening should be bigger to accommodate items. I like the color and things are easy to find. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SwissMiss

customer_reviews.title: Zippers broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that despite amazingly positive reviews that this didn’t work out. I noticed a couple zipper complaints, but decided to give it a shot. I packed it up today and found I couldn’t zip it shut.
customer_reviews.author: JR2

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's GREAT!!! Got it today and tried it out immediately. Had to make sure all my trip stuff will fit! Sure enough it ALL fits. No more taking a bathroom bag AND makeup bag. I don't use full size bottles though, but it seems like there would be enough room for 2-3. I'm super excited to use it next month. The only negative I noticed is when the bag was full and I went to unzip the top make up/mesh compartment the weight of the bag made the zipper "jump" and get a little messed up. Once I took the weight off it and re-tried it it worked fine. Maybe just have those compartments unzipped before hanging it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Premium or Extra large here
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy and just got mine. Wow its small. if you have more then one electric shaver plus all your other essentials There is not enough room. When I looked at it I thought it was a miniature version of what it described. There is nothing large about it and as far as quality there is nothing that's any nicer then you could get cheaper. In my opinion Premium and Extra large are both made up to over charge you.
customer_reviews.author: FASTER220

customer_reviews.title: Great bag but cheap zippers
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a great size and worked really well for the first short trip I used it for, the compartments are handy and useful. I was satisfied for that trip. But the second time I needed it, I noticed that several of the zippers had either broken/separated or became difficult to open and close. The zippers are definitely cheaply made and don't last which was quite disappointing. Unfortunately I can't really recommend, as it's useless without working zippers. Would have been great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: TinaB

customer_reviews.title: BADLY CONSTRUCTED = USELESS.
customer_reviews.text: This toiletry bag was so badly constructed that it was useless. One of the two sides that open up was correctly positioned and upright. The other side was ATTACHED UPSIDE-DOWN. You couldn't put anything in it without it falling out! I couldn't believe they would send out such a piece of garbage. Of course I returned it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this at the gym after showering and also for travel. It's great! Advice to the manufacturer: 1) I do wish the hanging hook was removable - it gets in the way when I zip the main pouch closed. 2) It would be nice if it had a separate lined compartment for a hairbrush as all of the large compartments have the nice mesh lining. My brush gets stuck in the mesh and I fear it will tear it. 3) I am putting a piece of cardboard in the bottom so that it will hold the rectangular shape when I open it instead of flopping around. Buyers: Overlook those details as it's a great addition to your routine.
customer_reviews.author: TanyaBo

customer_reviews.title: Lots of  Organization and Roomy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is a little big for my taste but love all of the organization possibilities. Taking it on a trip this summer. I can update this after the trip for function. Update after use: Will hold a lot of items but takes up way too much space in a backpack. Inside mesh pockets ripped after second day. Would be nice to have a smaller option for backpack users with a little stronger pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: one of these bags could support a "low-medium maintenance guy and one medium maintenance woman"
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our family trips. We haven't actually used them yet; but they seem like they'll hold up well. I was trying to decide (when I was browsing for this item), if one would "support" more than two people (or more than two daughters..let's be honest...girls tend to need/want more toiletries) on a trip. I was right, one of these bags could support a "low-medium maintenance guy and one medium maintenance woman", BUT NO MORE THAN THAT!! So I opted for two of these...I think two will do the trick for us. I will update if/when needed
customer_reviews.author: travelgirl

customer_reviews.title: This bag appears to have very good quality. It is a good size to carry ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag appears to have very good quality. It is a good size to carry many toiletries while traveling. I switched from a roll up style of bag that had individual zippered areas for different items and have not totally adjusted. I would like it better if there were areas where your items would be secured. I also think the elastic which is provided to slip bottles into should vary in size. Very few of my items fit in the ones provided. Nice bag but not sure it will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Roomy but awkward
customer_reviews.text: I really was excited for my first trip with this bag. My husband and I could finally bring just one toiletries bag. All of our stuff fit into the bag which was great. However when I hung the bag on the towel rack it sagged and it was difficult to find what I was looking for. There are pockets in the opening flap that I had some makeup in. That made it difficult to set it on the counter. Also the side pockets did not open fully so it was tough to find what I was looking for. The search continues for the perfect toiletries bag.
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: Comically Large
customer_reviews.text: In spite of breaking out a tape measure as I was reading the dimensions of this toiletry bag, I still thought it would be a reasonably (if slightly bigger than desired) size. When I received the bag, I discovered that even empty, if zipped up it took up a full half of my Eagle Creek Gear Warrior carry-on bag (international size)! When I showed it to my husband without telling him what it was, he asked me why I'd purchased a kid's backpack XD I can't imagine that this bag is for travel, because it is clearly designed to carry every full-sized bottle of product you own.
customer_reviews.author: S C

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for back to back trips/travel
customer_reviews.text: I had 5 trips planned for this summer (5 more than usual) and after the first one I knew it was time to consolidate all the toiletries/Knick knacks I always think I’m going to need/use on vacation. Multiple pockets make it easy to organize and separate (small mesh zipper pouches for hair ties, larger cylindrical pockets for travel face wash/lotion/perfume etc. ) with enough free space in the center to store larger items and still zip close. I hung this in my bathroom in between trips to save myself the struggle of unpacking just to repack! Solid purchase and def. necessary for a busy travel season.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Material and Zipper
customer_reviews.text: The material does not feel like it will last long. The main thing I don't like is that the zippers keep getting stuck at the bottom. For girls going camping, I would choose a different bag. The clip for hanging does not look like it will hole up long as it moves a lot and you have to keep tucking it in when you go to zip it at the bottom. I do not like how the zipper is hard to close and you have to manuveur the bag to close it.Color is great and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Portillo

customer_reviews.title: Great travel toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: I travel for business weekly and in need of a new bag.After reading reviews and measuring dimensions, I ordered the black with purple piping bag . It is perfect for my needs. the sides easily store toothbrush,paste on one and brush one the other. Main compartment when open has a good depth to it but the best part is everything is easily visible so items getting lost at the bottom is no longer an issue. The flap has a small zippered pocket that is perfect for an extra set of earrings. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Y

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to envision when reading the measurements but I went ahead and ordered it based on good reviews and that it was plenty of space for most people. So I have found out that I am not most people and this bag is too small. It needs to be at least 25% larger than it is - 1/3 larger would be ideal. 3 stars for a quality product; would have been 4 stars if the price was better and 5 stars if the size was right. Quite disappointed but I guess I'll find some use for it elsewhere. I found and ended up buying a suitable sized toiletry bag from TJ Maxx for $10 less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, just not quite as big in person/real life travel
customer_reviews.text: Not NEARLY as big as it looks. Can fit my stuff but thought hubby's things would slide in easily. It holds our shampoo and conditioner, razor, half-size of a regular shaving cream canister, one large (1-week, two-sided day/night) pill case, face wash, moisturizer, small contact solution, case, and rewetting drops, brush...and, well, that's about it. I totally thought it was the holy grail of standard shower items for a couple. Never expected to fill with full makeup bag and brushes or anything else. We use this plus his small kit and my extras. Great quality. love the pockets and roominess for what it can hold....just not as fabulous as we had expected. I'll get a smaller size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY - NOT LUGGAGE STRENGTH (COLLAPSES)
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars because the bag is a bit FLIMSY. I cut our a slice of thick cardboard strip and lined the bottom compartment to help stop it from collapsing. That seemed to work well. If you were packing this inside of your luggage I can understand why you would want it to give. I bought it to hold electronic equipment. Quality of parts and fabrics is good. Dimensions are correct.
customer_reviews.author: Pippy

customer_reviews.title: 12 Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our summer road trip. My husband and I have 4 boys and we housed all toothbrushes, toothpastes, 8 travel bottles, 2 small deoderants, razors, combs, floss, nail snippers, and even my loofah. The simple fact it fit all the specific bath needs of a family of 6 (toddler, sensitive skin, male, and female products) was highly impressive given it's size. Stuffed to the max it held up perfect over a month of constant use, most of which was hanging up. Looks brand new, and compact enough to pack in a carry-on for a weekend trip as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Silvey

customer_reviews.title: not perfect, but basically what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It is the size and configuration of a toiletry bag that I was looking for, seems sturdy and generally well made, and should work for me. However, I wish the base was more stable, since it isn't hanging up all of the time and it's hard to keep it upright when it's sitting down. It's also a little difficult to open and especially close the main zipper. So, like I said, it's not perfect, but it's basically what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Meeple

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this tote
customer_reviews.text: I love this tote for my makeup. I was looking for something with many compartments to keep stuff organized because i was tired of digging through or emptying out my one compartment make up bag to look for an item or two I needed. This makes all the difference! I love the way I can hang it on the back of my bathroom door or towel rack. I would highly recommend this product. The quality and workmanship is very durable and I don't think it would disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: annalynn

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I go back and forth between living places a lot and with vacations and work I'm always on the move, so this was perfect. I use to keep everything in plastic bags, this keeps everything organized and nicely tucked in my travel bag and easy to use. Definitely recommend. Fits decent sized products too not just travel sized. I have a full sized mouth wash and two full sized OGX shampoo and conditioner in it and much more to judge size.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Do I recommend?.. yes
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bag. I was hesitant that I wouldn’t have room for all my stuff, but I had more than enough. I didn’t think I’d have room for a few extras plus all my make up, but I did!! It’s all in there! The only negative is when hanging, the stuff in the middle compartment falls forward since there is the bottom of bag is strictly fabric. Would be better if it had a firm base so the bag doesn’t fold up on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Lets

customer_reviews.title: All the Space You Need and More!
customer_reviews.text: I went on a search for this style of hanging toiletry bag after the one I had been using (a gift from a medical company) was stolen along with my briefcase. I primarily need it when traveling to carry my ostomy supplies, however, I had the opportunity to use it recently simply for toiletries and medications on a trip with my family. It was fantastic! The size of it was a little intimidating at first, but we needed every single space offered. My wife and I were able to put in all our toiletries, all medications, and even all my ostomy supplies for a short trip to Yosemite. Worked like a charm. And you absolutely cannot beat that color!
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Countryman

customer_reviews.title: Look for another bag.  Awkward.
customer_reviews.text: The travel bag does not stay upright when on counter. It is difficult to load toiletry items when not using the hanger. The zippered flap opening is rigid and makes accessibility difficult unless you are hanging the bag up. The fabric is sturdy and looks good but I would look for another travel toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy — lacks structure & support. Doesn’t stay balanced.
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be sturdier given the price, but it is very flimsy and doesn’t have much structure or support. After packing all of my toiletries, it became distorted and unbalanced and it won’t even sit up straight without falling down. I haven’t even used any of the top pockets either.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Austin

customer_reviews.title: A must have for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Love this travel bag. We got a great price on it on Prime Day but would happily pay full price. Our family went on vacation but weren't at any one place for long. This bag was great for our toothbrushes and paste on one side, another side for q-tips, fingerclips and other items, inside great for bottles that you may not have caps for (ex: hairspray, spray deodarant, etc). It held so much for us and made picking up and going to next location a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Holds a great many items but takes up space.
customer_reviews.text: I travel often. This bag will go with me in long trips but not the shorter carry on luggage trips as it takes up too much space in the smaller suitcase. I'm my larger bag that I use for cruises or longer vacations, it fits in with my packing cubes. It is well made & sturdy & I like the side and outer pockets very much. It cannot be washed in the washer & that is a negative .
customer_reviews.author: Book Ninja

customer_reviews.title: I got the loud color because of the couple bucks off but that turned out to be a bonus as in my tumble of clothes it was easy to spot and extract when I arrived at my ...
customer_reviews.text: I was doubtful, both that it’d be too big and that it’d be too small- I’m a chronic over packer. It’s just right with enough room for mostly full size toiletries, hairbrush, vitamins, and even a dedicated facial washcloth in one side pocket. If I’d wanted I could have tucked in my travel size straightening iron in its protective pouch. I got the loud color because of the couple bucks off but that turned out to be a bonus as in my tumble of clothes it was easy to spot and extract when I arrived at my destination sleepy. I put it on the counter as it seemed too heavy to hang on a towel bar/hook- like I said, overpacker.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Em

customer_reviews.title: Worthless if you want a hanging bag
customer_reviews.text: First time I used it, th hanging hook fell off, leaving it pretty useless since it can’t up by itself. Pretty bummed about it since I probably can’t send it back now. Turned into a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Travel awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if I was going to have enough room in the bag. Let me tell you, I was wrong. I fit so much in here and so will you. Especially if you take a few minutes to figure out the best way to pack what you need. I love the having aspect of this bag so I don’t have to set it on the counter and take up the valuable counter space. I will be taking this to Europe this summer and traveling with two of my girlfriends, so bathroom counter space will limited for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing organizer
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure I'd like this but my toiletries were spread out across four bags - yikes! You can stand this up on the bathroom counter or hang it. Lots of pockets for upright storage. It's roomy enough in the center compartment for my 3-1-1 toiletries bag - I have TSA Precheck so don't have to remove my liquids. It's a little scary when you pack your carryon and this bag takes up 1/3 of the space. But trust me, if you use packing cubes with this organizer, everything will fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! It is HUGE and I'm able to fit every possible item I need for travel in here. All the little pockets really keep things organized. It looks like a quality bag with nice large zipper pulls, and I love how many colors this comes in. This could be the perfect travel bag. The description was excellent and there was a video of someone showing the bag's features. It arrived in plastic wrap and in perfect condition. This is is much better than the 5 small plastic bags and cosmetic pouches I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Jadziacatz

customer_reviews.title: It Is A Quality Product, But...
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a recent three week trip to Europe. The case was as described and reviewed, it held a lot of products and the quality was good. Their were two issues that I had: First, there were a few compartments that I could not use because they were too small. It might be just my makeup, though. Second, is it was bulky for me and weighed a lot. Going forward, I am going to get a smaller bag with less compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Abbee

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this bag!! It is so well made & holds so much!! My hubs & I just made a cross-country trip in July (WV to CA to WV)! I stuffed this bag full of items - it was loaded, unloaded, tossed around, dropped, packed away & unpacked! And it is still in like new condition! No tears, rips, spots, stains & the colors are still vibrant! I love it! It's going with me everywhere and we travel a lot! Side Note- I love that this company is called FreeGrace! That just speaks to me!
customer_reviews.author: H. Rucker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizer for meds/hygiene!
customer_reviews.text: We took this bag to India, then Thailand. Lots of plane trips & hotel stays. It was an enormous help! Kept our meds, wipes, toothbrushes (I even fit hairbrushes inside) organized and easily accessible on the plane and in the hotel. It has a nifty hook for hanging it (flap open) on the wall. You wouldn’t believe what fits inside it...
customer_reviews.author: janak23in

customer_reviews.title: LLLLOOOOOOVVVVEEEE this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I LLLLLOOOOOOOOOVVVVEEE this travel bag. It is cute! It is has just the right compartments. It is convenient. It is amazing that just having this organization makes my travel trips less stressful. Hangs easily in the bathroom. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because upon arrival, 2 of the zippers had "derailed". However, when I re-zipped, they were as good as new. It hasn't happened since, but only time will tell how the zippers hold up. Still,, I can't say enough, this bag is FANTASTIC!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has room for just about everything and the compartments are well organized. It is larger than I thought it would be so I would most likely use it for a road trip rather than a plane trip. I also thought it could be useful as a first aid kit in the house so everything that you might need is in one place. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Beanie

customer_reviews.title: Holds everything
customer_reviews.text: Normally I have been carrying a large bag with a zip as my toiletries bag, this one holds everything in place and is great to travel with as I don't have to feel around with my hands pulling everything out to find what I'm looking for, everything is right there in its place and easy to get without removing all my toiletries, best purchase ever
customer_reviews.author: Jacster

customer_reviews.title: Great Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toiletry bag to replace the old, bulky MaryKay bag I have had since 2005.Everything that was in my former bag easily fit into the Freegrace bag which is much more compact. The zipper side pockets are very useful and the main compartment makes it easy to see and reach items that I need for my morning and evening routines. I also like that it has a metal hook. These pictures are followup on my original review. I have added some pictures of what was IN the Freegrace toiletry bag and how it all fit in the bag. I was easily able to zip it up! I could have fit a few more small items in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Item has a lot of pockets, but some of side pockets are so tight, that it would be hard to store anything in them other than a tissue or a nail file. One of the zippers was off the track already after I unpacked the item. It serves the purpose, but would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great! I was able to fit everything my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great! I was able to fit everything my daughter and I needed to last a 7 day cruise in it with no issues! There is a place for everything and plenty of room to store small-medium size bottles of shampoo, conditioner, lotions and anything else you might need. I even had room to pack extra "just in case" items. I've used it a few times since that trip and it's holding up really well. Wipes down clean easily. Will definitely purchase another if this one ever decides to give out.
customer_reviews.author: Motox294

customer_reviews.title: t was moderately useful but I can't say that I would heartily recommend ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this during on a 3-week trip. t was moderately useful but I can't say that I would heartily recommend this product; there are probably similar items that function better. There are plenty of pockets & sections to accommodate a regular-sized hairbrush & tubes and containers that hold approximately 3 ounces or less. Small items tend to get lost in the main section. When filled, it tilts forward allowing content to spill. If the bag can't be hung, it is frustrating to use because the center piece doesn't stay open. The side section zippers tend to get stuck at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: meeksml

customer_reviews.title: Fits large items
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best Toiletry Bags i have ever owned. It fits all my large shower Shampoo, conditioners, soap bottles, my tall hairspray can. great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to put those in the same bag ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to Eruope to keep all my toiletries in one place. What sold me is the special spot for my make-up brushes. I love being able to put those in the same bag and know they are protected. Brushes can be expensive so that makes a difference. I can't believe how much STUFF this thing holds too! I have a lot of lotions and serums for my face and this was able to hold all of them, plus make-up, glasses, contact solution, tooth brush and paste and a host of other little things.
customer_reviews.author: emdero

customer_reviews.title: ... this because it was on sale but I'm so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this because it was on sale but I'm so glad I did. It has lots of pockets and was very functional. It made it easy to find everything. I was able to put a lot of stuff in this little bag. I did have a shampoo leak when I used this bag. The outside of the bag got a little damp (it was a big leak though) but everything around this bag stayed dry. I was really impressed. I'm very glad I bought this toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rose P

customer_reviews.title: Holds A Lot More Than You Think It Will
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received the bag because it was smaller than I thought it would be. But I was very pleasantly surprised on a recent trip. The bag is thoughtfully designed and really holds a lot, especially those awkward bottles that the regular hanging toiletry bags can't accommodate. Perfect gift for anyone who travels.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: 10 month update!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have put this thing through the wringer honestly. Used it every day for 10 months while traveling and the zippers haven't split or failed at all! They seemed so delicate! And I pack it pretty full with large items. I definitely can't complain about this purchase! Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi3.0

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, attractive & functional!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grown daughter for an overseas trip and she is extremely happy with this toiletry bag. She had researched probably all bags available and chose yours for it's valuable features. It arrived on time, well packaged and my daughter is very happy. This is a well-made very attractive and functional bag.
customer_reviews.author: patricia pasciuto

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, we’ll designed with brilliant compartments
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and so many handy compartments. It’s really well designed and thought out, with lots of elasticised holders for brushes etc, pockets, and larger spaces as well. The coat-hanger style hook is so useful, and the fabric is light and water résistent making it great for travel. So spacious, I couldn’t even fill it!! That’s a first!!!
customer_reviews.author: BGirl

customer_reviews.title: Many miles, many countries, still holding up!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this bag! Since I got it, I do not need to pull everything out on a small hotel bathroom counter anymore but can use my make up, beauty tools and toiletries straight out of it in an easy, organized fashion. The bag has multiple pockets and compartments, sufficient for everything; the materials are pretty sturdy and I have had zero issues with the zippers or the mesh liners.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that I could pack into my suitcase and then whip out and hang in bathroom with items easy to use. Bingo! perfect for me. The first trip a lotion leaked, and the contents were confined in one pocket. And I love the bright color - just what I need in the morning,
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It really fits a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this bag. I was able to fit SO MUCH MORE inside this than I had in my previous bag, and I still had room to spare. The best part is this bag is more compact than the old one! I fit all of my travel size toiletries, a hair brush and comb, full size toothbrush, makeup brushes, makeup, q-tips, cotton balls, and more and I even have a few pockets still empty! I travel a lot for work and this is going to make life much easier! I'm thrilled with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gatling

customer_reviews.title: Makes Everything Easy to Find
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. Love all the organizing pockets. Makes everything easy to find. We previously used one that sat on the counter, so the hanging feature is a plus. Now it's out of the way. Fits a lot of full size product as well. We keep it packed and ready to go. Love the color.. Looks like vacation! May have to buy some more as gifts for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill Gilford

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very well made, but too big?
customer_reviews.text: It is very roomy, has lots of pockets and the material, pockets, and zippers are all very well made, sturdy, and is easy to organize. The only fault I found with it was that it was big and allowed me to take too much stuff because I felt the need to fill it. It's not it's fault, but I would like this bag better if it was about 2/3 the size.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: I needed to replace my old travel bag - which I loved! This bag is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag as a birthday gift (was on my wishlist). I needed to replace my old travel bag - which I loved! This bag is amazing! Its approximately the same size as my old bag but It fits a ton more stuff! The pockets are fantastic and it still has the hook to hang up if needed. The bag is very good quality and the color is spot on from what was shown on the website. The video made by this company showing the bag was a big factor in the decision making process. It's a bit expensive but so worth it! I would recommend this bag to all travelers.
customer_reviews.author: R. Corey

customer_reviews.title: A 45-year search for the perfect toiletry bag has ended!
customer_reviews.text: PHENOMENAL bag for my travel cosmetics and personal care items. Well made and thoughtfully designed: all pockets are easy to access when the bag is sitting on a flat surface, or when it is hanging. Often, hanging bags are designed such that some items are upside down when hanging. Also, none of that irritating plastic pocket business: nice, sturdy fabric mesh that lets things breathe. I have just ordered another one, and will order some for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Pax Deo

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the best buys I've ever made
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best buys I've ever made. It fits absolutely all my toiletries when I travel, without taking up a ton of space or things getting disorganized. I don't know how it does it; it's like Hermione's purse in Harry Potter; you can just fit an unbelievable amount of stuff in there. It has a little hook so you can hang it up and get to your things as easily as if they were laid out on a shelf, and it's small and square so it's easy to pack. Seriously, this thing is amazing. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stark

customer_reviews.title: My Final Toiletry Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tote that I have ever found. The interior will hold a regular size bottle of shampoo, etc. All my toiletries fit nicely in this bag so that I carry it to the bathroom and I'm set. I pack this in checked bag when traveling for more than a few days, i.e. overseas. Keeps everything I need in place and doesn't take up space. I am giving away my two other bags (nice brands I won't mention) as this one meets my needs completely.
customer_reviews.author: Layla

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little quality improvement!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, don't get me wrong. It fits tons of stuff and works great as my gym toiletry bag. However, the zipper is flimsy and the inner liner on the front zipper has already ripped, leading me to have to dig my jewelry out of the entire top of the bag. Not good. Which is too bad, because I liked the bag itself. Do a little quality improvement, please!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. I was able to fit most everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. I was able to fit most everything I needed into the bag and keep it well organized. I use it for camping so it's handy in our small travel trailer bathroom. It works great for carrying to the public showers as well. The only downside I came across is that it could be about 1-2 inches taller to accommodate one of my full size hair products. But to be fair, the can of hair product is a bit taller than the standard. The standard sizes fit fine. All in all I'm very happy with it. Much better than the mid or small size bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toiletry bag! It holds everything I need. It has pockets where I can put extra small items and keeps everything organized. It sits well on the counter or can be hung up. So far, it seems really sturdy too. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Teeta

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is out of town for a while and he’s used it for about a month now and it’s still holding up well. It’s pretty big as far as the amount of stuff you can fit in it. It has zipper compartments for cosmetics but he uses it for razors, toothbrush, etc.
customer_reviews.author: savanneccentric

customer_reviews.title: ... ones that rolled up but this one is way better she can put her shampoo and conditioner and lotions ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother in law for Christmas being she travels a lot she had one of the flat ones that rolled up but this one is way better she can put her shampoo and conditioner and lotions and make up razors toothbrush etc. all kinds of stuff way more than she could in the one she had before definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: James & Jennifer Champion

customer_reviews.title: Nifty toiletry bag
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same toiletry bag for ages but it's finally falling apart. I needed a new one and couldn't find exactly the same configuration. This is smaller but I think it will be more efficient and once I learn how to pack it, will be better than what I had. The item arrived quickly, without issue and was exactly what was pictured when ordered from Freegrace.
customer_reviews.author: L. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hanging  travel bag!
customer_reviews.text: I just barely packed this hanging travel bag. It was fun to be able to fit most everything I needed, in it and it seems fairly compact and organized. I haven’t actually used it yet on a vacation or trip but I think it will work out just fine and I’ll be very glad that I got it. I do love the color and the material it’s made out of as well. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sher Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is so handy for travel. My husband and I travel for work and are on the road most of the year. I have tried several organizing thingys for travel and this is definitely one of two things that make travel easier. It holds our electric toothbrush, toothpaste(2 kinds), 2 razors with replacements, lotion, balms, shampoo, deodorant, nail supplies, shower poofs, etc. It is handy to have all toiletries in one easy grab bag. I have ordered another one for our remedies and vitamins which is working out nicely. The quality is good. Zippers are easy and the stitching is well done.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C

customer_reviews.title: This toiletry organizer bag is my favorite of its kind
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot, both nternationally, and domestically. This toiletry organizer bag is my favorite of its kind. Not only do I love the bright color combinations, but it's functionality couldn't be better. It has an amazing amount of products (including standards sized bottles of shampoo, lotion or whatever) yet somehow it seems quite compact in size. It's kinda like an Alice in Wonderland bag that somehow seems to shrink everything down once it's inside the bag. It's also very well constructed with high quality materials. I definitely recommend this toiletry bag, and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brina Do Universo

customer_reviews.title: Colorful, lightweight and lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I have several toiletry bags, but this one is the best. Quick Prime freedelivery, ($4 + shipping costs) lower price than other similar bags,10 pockets (3 on the outside), fun colors, side zip pockets, able to hang it, great packable size-11x5.5x10 inches. Get one, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: DJB21

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag but it is kind of annoying that when it is hung up, it doesn't lay flat against the wall due to the wight distribution. It is a great size and fits a TON of stuff, almost too much! I will use it though, but I will probably buy another small one for shorter trips.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It’s great and super cute
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it has the extra side wings that fold out. And aqua color that I got was really cute and bright. And this might sound weird but because it is insulated and has side pockets and extra places to put things, this could probably be an excellent lunch box.... just saying....
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Pockets everywhere but handy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with another incase I didn’t like one, ended up giving my mom this one (I still like it though). My Mom NEEDED this! Her favorite color is green so it worked out perfect that I bought a green one. So far she loves it and has come in handy! Her only complaint is the hook. It isn’t sewn inside the zipper so when the hook is tucked the zipper can’t be zipped all the way or you have to let it hangout, then it gets in the way when you go to zip the bag closed
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lot's of room, tons of pockets and mesh bottle holders.
customer_reviews.text: Great size, but it does take up one-quarter of the 24" suitcase, but that is what I need to put all of my haircare and bath items. Once in the hotel, it hangs, very nice. Zippers work fine and the side pockets hold many items. Lots of nice pockets to hold all those smaller items. The inside is roomy and has very nice mesh pockets to hold everything. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Di-Pyle

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size travel bag. It's really big and fits everything I need. Its tall enough for me to pack 8oz bottles of anything like shampoo, conditioner, body wash, lotion, shaving cream, Great price also.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Russell

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and size of the bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to store a few things and it is working out great. The color is really pretty, the bag seems sturdy and the size is pretty large. The zippers do stick a bit, but I think after some use they will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room for essentials
customer_reviews.text: It's big, and probably best for this who travel frequently or for longer periods of time. This might be a bit much for short trips or infrequent travelers. The quality has proved to be adequate and is my new favorite toiletry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Not as large as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The description stated that it was an extra large bag. I was expecting it to be much larger than it was. I use it for my niece when she travel with us for her toiletries. It works great for her items.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Pockets, very well designed
customer_reviews.text: Love all of the pockets!! This is a very well designed product. I do a lot of housesitting and need to bring everything with me, this bag easily allows me to do so and can either sit on the counter or hang from a hook as needed. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: miscelaney

customer_reviews.title: Great Hanging Toiletry Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for me and one to give as a gift. I just used for the first time on a 5 day vacation out of state and staying in a hotel. This bag worked excellent for me. Lots of room for everything I needed. I love it! 1/19/2020 - UPDATE! I Purchased again as a Christmas gift for a friend. Still love this bag and take it every time I travel!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: One bag fits all.
customer_reviews.text: I was planning a short trip and I wanted to have all my toiletries in one bag. In the past, traveling was such a hassle having make-up, lotions, toothbrush and toothpaste, etc. in different cosmetic bags. I was able to fit everything I needed to bring and had room to spare. This is one of the smartest purchases I have made on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ferryman

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this bag! I travel for business every other week and keep duplicates of my shampoo, conditioner, face wash, lotion, electric toothbrush (in its case), toothbrush charger, hair care products, face lotion, wrinkle cream, etc. This bag literally can hold everything. I like the pockets on the side and the pouches in the main compartment I thought I would never use, but I actually find them useful. I would highly recommend this bag. The color is really pretty too!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Not the best toiletry bag for Backpackers
customer_reviews.text: In concept and organization, I do appreciate this bag, it has several interior pockets for organizing, etc. The problem with this bag is that it is HUGE and there is no way to make it smaller. It is not suited for backpacking travel, which is predominantly what I do. Wish I had known that prior to purchasing as I can no longer return it and I still need a smaller bag. If you travel with a lot of big luggage, it isn't a terrible purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: So handy for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I travel. It amazes me how much I can fit in this bag. When I unpack, I can hang it up and unzip the sides and all my toiletries and makeup are visible and easy to access without taking up any counter space. The quality is excellent as it looks as good as new even after at least a dozen trips.
customer_reviews.author: HayleyBC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time recently and absolutely love it. So easy to pack and carry and easy to hang when you get to your destination. I was only going for a week-long trip and there was plenty of room for more supplies. The outside pockets, with their small storage pockets, make this where there is a place for everything and everything stays in its place. I've had several travel bags over the years and this is by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Nice for travel
customer_reviews.text: It's a little one, so heavy bottles will weigh it down and make it hang weird, but it's pretty nice for the price. It'll be good for long weekends where you don't need a lot of makeup and shampoos, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, lots of pockets
customer_reviews.text: It's a very attractive bag, well-made and well-designed. It uses mesh for the pockets, which is good for breathability. As for storage, there are pockets on pockets, and a few you kind of just discover while using it. It can easily accommodate a couple of 12 or 16 oz. bottles, giving you some latitude about your bottle sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This bag was better than I expected! It is a quality bag big enough to hold everything you need for your trip and all the compartments help keep you organized. I looked at a lot of websites and bags before I bought this bag. All I can say is don't waste your time..you will not find a better bag for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Carol B

customer_reviews.title: my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my wife to replace her old makeup travel kit ... she thinks it's great, particularly that is use a metal hook for hanging (not cheap plastic). very satisfied with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sab_Fan

customer_reviews.title: We ordered it in her favorite colors and filled it with goodies
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag as a gift to cheer my young niece who was facing surgery. We ordered it in her favorite colors and filled it with goodies. Not only did it lift her spirits, she absolutely loved it and showed it off to everyone! BTW . . . her name is Grace so the name on the bag was an extra plus! Great product. Thanks Freegrace.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Crader

customer_reviews.title: This a lunch box
customer_reviews.text: This is a lunch box it’s not made for cosmetics or travel items very misleading I will be sending this back ASAP very dissatisfied Poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything!
customer_reviews.text: I took this toiletry bag with me on a 2 week trip. It was perfect. I usually have a bag for toiletries and a separate bag for makeup, but because this had different compartments and was so roomy, I was able to fit everything in one bag, have it organized, and still have room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! I can fit both travel size items and regular sized bottles of shampoo/conditioner with no problems. It holds quite a bit in a very organized manner. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Delores

product_meta.title: Hanging Toiletry Bag Extra Large Capacity | Premium Travel Organizer Bags For Men And Women | Durable Waterproof Nylon Bathroom, Shower, Makeup Bag For Toiletries, Cosmetics, Brushes
product_meta.description:
STARTING TODAY: Travel With Great Comfort & Style Using A Freegrace Toiletry Bag

Are you tired of having to dig through a mess just to get your toothbrush from your bag? 

Do you hate wasting time trying to pack your toiletries and cosmetics for a trip? 

Wouldn’t you like to save yourself valuable time and effort? 

Freegrace may just have exactly what you need! 

Introducing Freegrace’s Extra Large Toiletry Bag - Up To 50% More Space! 

This great, spacey bag is 11'' x 5.9'' x 9.85'' - 150% the size of a normal toiletry bag. It’s large enough to fit full size bottles and is ideal for couples, families and long term travel. 

You can also forget everything you knew about messy baggage. This toiletry bag features three separate compartments and a strong hanging hook to make organizing your accessories, cosmetics and travel essentials easier than ever before! 

As if that wasn’t enough, this amazing bag has no less than TEN mesh pockets! You will never waste another extra second trying to find anything. Your baggage is going to be perfectly organized and optimized for efficiency - easy as pie! 

Superior Quality Meets Great Design In The Perfect Toiletry Bag For Men & Women

You can use this practical unisex toiletry bag with absolute peace of mind; it will never fall short of your expectations. It’s made of the most durable waterproof nylon fabric and masterfully stitched to be sturdy and dependable. 

You can even use it at home, to finally get that messy bathroom cupboard in order! 

It will be by far the best toiletry bag you have ever used! Benefit from our great 90-day money back warranty and see for yourself! 

Don’t Waste Any More Time - Click ‘Add To Cart’ & Order Now!
feature_bullets: Premium Nylon, Metal Hook, Pearl Cotton Cushion, Size: 11'' x 5.9'' x 9.85''

✔ THE #1 TOILETRY BAG FOR YOU: Freegrace’s extra large toiletry bag combines large storage capabilities and a compact, lightweight body. Either at home or during your travels, this toiletry bag is ideal to contain your cosmetics and personal effects. What’s more, it has a great hanging hook that makes using it a breeze!

✔ INTUITIVE DESIGN: Organizing your travel essentials and cosmetics has never been easier! With this amazing toiletry bag’s numerous compartments, you’ll be able to find exactly what you’re looking for in seconds, without digging through a mess of haphazardly thrown items and accessories!
✔ LARGE SIZE: Forget everything you knew about conventional travel toiletry bags. This one has ample space to fit all your cosmetics, make up, shaving accessories, toothbrush and toothpaste.

✔ TOP NOTCH QUALITY: Made from the best quality honeycomb nylon fabric and cushioned with pearl cotton, this toiletry bag is among the most durable and lightweight in the market. It’s waterproof and tear resistant, and will be your favorite traveling companion for a long, long time! You can order a classy black bag, or choose among seven vibrant and lively colors.

✔ ORDER WITH CONFIDENCE: At Freegrace, we strive to bring to you products of the highest quality and craftsmanship. If for any reason you find your new toiletry bag subpar, you can benefit from our 90-day money back warranty, hassle free!
